newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: New Dutch state bond raises Dfl 2.3 bln to date.
newsitem.headline: New Dutch state bond raises Dfl 2.3 bln to date.

text.p: The Dutch state's new 5.75 percent September 2002 bond has raised 2.3 billion guilders after three days of sales, the Finance Ministry said on Wednesday.
A spokesman for the ministry said no new funds were raised today.
"So we've done nothing today," he told Reuters.
Tap sales began on Monday and will continue daily from 0700 to 1500 GMT until further notice.
The ministry lowered the opening price for tap sales today to 100.15 from 100.30 at the opening on Tuesday.
The opening price on Monday was 100.60.
